data.name: Red Algorithm - Osiris
data.detailed_description:
Purchase premium hero Osiris in Red Algorithm to support the game and have some fun

Details

  • This DLC doesn't contain any files to download, it just unlocks the hero
  • To unlock the hero with the DLC you need an active connection to Steam
  • To see all heroes please make sure that “premium heroes” is set to “always” in settings
  • The DLC configuration (hero name, native bonuses, starting weapon, consumables and perk, etc.) could be changed in one of the future balance updates

Hero stats and equipment

  • Native strengths: [Damage +15%] [Experience +10%] [Splash +5%]
  • Native weakness: [Crit -10%] [Move speed -5%]
  • Starting weapon: Eclipse (5) pistol
  • Starting perk: Crowd Control (slows down spawners' production)
  • Starting consumables: 2 drones
  • Favourite skills: pistols and plasma

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
